title: Renekton's W bugged in the middle of a ranked..
body: during a ranked game i had something very odd happen.. my W (the stun) stopped stunning them and didn't do damage but went on cool down? is this a bug, glitch, my computer? please someone help and if anyone else getting buggy things comment below.{{champion:58}} {{champion:58}} {{champion:58}} {{champion:58}}

replies.body: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=cxMF9Kum2qU Is this what you're talking about?
that is exactly what I'm talking about!!
Well I have no idea why Riot isn't doing anything about this, this is a pretty big bug honestly they should disable Renekton until this is fixed.
yeah man, but it hasn't happened like once or twice its been happening quite bait so i just have given up.. I'm having a break from league (probe be on tomorrow or tonight hahaha)
Looks like it has something to do with pressing W whilst other abilities are still in motion.
sounds like an excuse for making a bad play, blame lag next time like me
